name: USSF Fitness Standards
description: Guardian-specific conditioning aligned with DAFI 36-2905 and the USSF Fitness Programming Guide.

cards.title: 1.5-Mile Run Tier Plan
cards.description: Map pacing splits for Guardian Tiers I-III (≤9:12, ≤10:20, ≤11:30) using DAFI 36-2905 tables; log training runs weekly. Ref: DAFI 36-2905.
cards.summaryText: Know your pacing plan before test day shows up.

cards.title: Push-Up Form Audit
cards.description: Film push-up technique vs. USSF standard (elbows lockout, 90° bend) and correct reps to meet Tier I count (≥57). Ref: USSF Fitness Guide 2024.
cards.summaryText: Perfect reps beat extra sloppy ones every time.

cards.title: Plank Progression
cards.description: Plan weekly plank holds building to Tier I requirement (≥3:35) with anti-extension accessories. Ref: DAFI 36-2905.
cards.summaryText: Consistency beats heroics when building core endurance.

cards.title: VO2 Max Zone-2 Block
cards.description: Schedule 2× weekly 45-minute Zone-2 sessions (65-75% HRmax) to lift VO2 for aerobic events. Ref: USSF Fitness Programming Guide.
cards.summaryText: Zone-2 is the aerobic cheat code for Guardians.

cards.title: Sprint Interval Booster
cards.description: Incorporate 6×400m intervals at goal pace with 90-second rest to sharpen run speed. Ref: USSF Fitness Programming Guide.
cards.summaryText: Intervals teach your body what test pace feels like.

cards.title: Strength Circuit Template
cards.description: Program push, pull, hinge, squat, and core moves hitting Tier I strength guardrails 2× weekly. Ref: Guardian Fitness Playbook.
cards.summaryText: Balanced strength keeps Guardians resilient under console hours.

cards.title: Body Composition Log
cards.description: Track waist-to-height ratio aiming ≤0.50 per USSF health standard using monthly measurements. Ref: DAFI 36-2905.
cards.summaryText: Small nutrition tweaks sustain compliance year-round.

cards.title: Mobility Prep Flow
cards.description: Use the USSF dynamic mobility series pre-testing (leg swings, inchworms, thoracic rotations) to reduce injury risk. Ref: USSF Fitness Guide.
cards.summaryText: Mobile joints fuel faster times and cleaner reps.

cards.title: Recovery Protocol
cards.description: Plan weekly recovery inputs (sleep ≥7 hrs, hydration 0.7 oz/lb, periodic deload) per Guardian Resilience guidance. Ref: Guardian Resilience Framework.
cards.summaryText: Recovery is a standard, not an indulgence.

cards.title: Nutritional Periodization
cards.description: Align macro intake with training blocks (build, peak, taper) using USAF Registered Dietitian templates. Ref: DAF Nutrition Guide.
cards.summaryText: Fuel shifts should match training focus for predictable results.

cards.title: Heat/Altitude Acclimation
cards.description: Apply gradual exposure protocols before tests at Peterson, Buckley, or overseas locations. Ref: DAFI 48-101.

cards.title: Diagnostic Mock Test
cards.description: Conduct a full diagnostic every 45 days, capturing event order, rest intervals, and scoring per DAFI 36-2905. Ref: DAFI 36-2905.
cards.summaryText: Diagnostics turn test day into a formality.
